name: The Anon
description:
Last year, an indecent had occur and scarred a young college boy. His mental health is decreasing every day without him realizing it, until his depression had taking the form of a ghost.

There’re 4 different ending in this game, every day you can pick between doing assignment, go outside or just masturbate in your room.

Help him to be free from his hell.

 

The controls are simple:

AD / left and right arrow keys - move

Space/Enter - skip

E - Interact

 

The game was made using Godot Engine as entry for my first game jam’s jam.

 

*This game is not suitable to be played by younger or easily offended people.

* This game also contains many bugs, so please don’t spam the button.

 

 

 

How to get all Ending(SPOILER)

***Only read this if you’re stuck or wish to see all the ending

 

 

Ending 1:

Let the dog die and reach 100 for the depression’s meter

Ending 2:

On the second day, go outside and take the money to buy the sex toy. Use it to reach 0 for the depression’s meter

Ending 3:

Go outside every day and don’t forget to feed your dog!

Ending 4:

Reach Day 8 to see this ending
